meanings.definition: Something that is put on top of food to add flavor or decoration.
meanings.sent1: I love adding toppings like cheese and pepperoni to my pizza.
meanings.sent2: The ice cream shop offers a variety of toppings such as sprinkles and whipped cream.
meanings.sent3: The toppings on the cake made it look like a colorful masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity knew no bounds as she added unique toppings to her salad.
meanings.sent5: The toppings on the cupcake were so delicious, they stole the show.

meanings.definition: The act of putting something on top of food.
meanings.sent1: The toppings of chocolate syrup and nuts made the sundae even more delicious.
meanings.sent2: She carefully performed the toppings of lettuce and tomatoes on the sandwich.
meanings.sent3: The chef's exaggerated toppings of parsley on the dish made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His toppings of wisdom and kindness were what truly set him apart from the rest.
meanings.sent5: The extravagant toppings on the burger made it a towering masterpiece of flavors.
